name: Praamžius
description:
Dive into the roots of Lithuania's past with "Praamžius", a base defence game centered around lithuanian folklore. The peaceful life of a farmer village is under threat by hordes of wolves that they must defend against. The player can use village resources to construct defences and pray to various Lithuanian pagan gods to receive special blessings that aide in the fight against the evil.

------------
Controls:
[WASD] or [Arrow keys] to move
Hold [Q] to spend coins, press [Q] to throw them
[E] to choose your blessing
[Esc] or [P] to pause game

------------
General gameplay tips:
Hire archers at tents to defend your village
Buy more farmlands for them to grow you coins
Make a sacrifice to the Gods to receive special blessings
Buy fences to stall the wolves from coming into the village

------------
God blessings:
Perkūnas, God of Thunder, will increase the chance for your archers' attacks to summon lightning from the sky.
Gabija, Goddess of Fire, will increase your archers' attack speed.
Žemyna, Goddess of Nature, will grow your crops by 2 stages instantly.
Mėnulis, God of Night, will increase the health of your fences.
Saulė, Goddess of Day, will make your crops grow faster.

------------
This game was created in Game Jam 2023, but more updates are on the way, so stay tuned!
